release.description: 4.1 release, should work with 4.0 and also 4.2 dev
release.action: Dependencies now visible and editable in Project View. Add/Edit/Remove dependency actions easily accessible from project explorer. One can download the missing dependencies, download/view it's javadoc etc.
MEVENIDE-165 - allow user to check the remote repositories for javadocs and sources of project's dependencies.
Added the default Netbeans IDE webapp deployment. Allows deploying and debugging on IDE-supported servers.
Access pom and property files from the project view.
Added webapp deployment, using Cargo (http://cargo.codehaus.org). Generally attempted to improve webapp/j2ee support.
Project template for extending Mevenide.
Multiple bugs fixed.
Add remote and local repository browser. Allow to download artifacts from remote repository.
Add dependency editing in visual project customizer.
Link findbugs report output with the IDE's editor. Add annotations into editor.
All editor annotations show up on errorstripe as well. (4.1 only)
In project customizer show list of available maven plugins and their properties.
Test Resources and Castus Test Sources added to project view.
In project view allow to filter the resource directory structure. Either show all files or just the included ones. Showing only included resources is the default now.
MEVENIDE-117 - set compilation using different JDK than maven+IDE uses, provide correct completion.
MEVENIDE-138 - resolve properties when processing dependencies.
MEVENIDE-115 - improved support for webapps. (JSTL)
MEVENIDE-63 and MEVENIDE-14 - inherited properties files taken into account in the UI.
MEVENIDE-128 - better handling when pom file unparsable.
MEVENIDE-72 - when changing version/artifactId/groupId suggest to update projects that depend on it.
Link pmd and checkstyle report output with the IDE's editor. Annotate the rule violations in the editor.
Additional properties panels, updated some other panels.
New Maven project templates for creation of Maven plugins and Netbeans modules.
Added definition of autoupdate server for mevenide.codehaus.org.
Improved dependencies display, adding generated sources to Project view and to the classpath/completion. Also adding ear sources to Project view.
Most POM properties are already editable in the Properties... dialog. It's also possible to move definitions between the project's POM file and the parent POM it's extending.
MEVENIDE-92 fix.
MEVENIDE-83 - fix classpath dependencies resolution.
MEVENIDE-77 - before running any goal, save edited files.
MEVENIDE-76 - completed the fix, also debugging of artifact works now.
hotfix MEVENIDE-76 - run project fixed.
MEVENIDE-48 Global setting of dependency download progress display. A reaonable default set to avoid too much output.
MEVENIDE-37 fixed. (Nervous classpath scanning - IDE too often regenerated classpath info)
MEVENIDE-65 fixed. (a maven.xml based goal doesn't require a ':' character anymore)
MEVENIDE-49 fixed. (JUnit integration works now)
Maven output error parsing. Linking failed tests and compilation errors.
Added basic support for testing the project, single class and test. (MEVENIDE-50)
Added basic support for running the project and running single class.
Added project view support for web apps.

Initial release, allows to open maven projects within Netbeans IDE 4.0. Sources, test sources and resources are displayed within the project tree. UI updates on chanches in POM and properties files. Code completion on dependencies.
When project declares maven.multiproject.includes, projects included get opened as well.
Possible to execute arbitrary maven goal or sequence of goals. IDE actions and shortcuts are matched to relevant maven goals. The goals are customizable per project or user.
